thread.title: Innovation key to compete: ex-White House official - Langley Advance
thread.title_full: Innovation key to compete: ex-White House official - Langley Advance - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Langley Advance
title: Innovation key to compete: ex-White House official - Langley Advance
text:
When Vivek Kundra started working in the White House in 2009, President Barack Obama was fighting "tooth-and-nail" to keep his BlackBerry. Seven years later, the once iconic Canadian-made smartphone has been relegated to an amusing anecdote for the United States' inaugural Chief Information Officer - and an example of the difficulties governments have keeping up with technology.
 Langley Advance.
